name: lastlarf
text: This was the first evidence of Pat's Barberphobia. One of my favourite running gags.

name: catachresis
text: It is certainly the funniest and most pure of the Pat Barberophobia gags. He has stayed on hold for a long time to say it.

name: charchar
text: Neat Word Alert: Tonsurphobia ( n. )- an irrational fear of haircuts.

name: al_batross
text: Pat is one of my favorite running gags.

name: biznart
text: Rod Huggins is one of his favorite gagging runs.

name: kazad
text: A comment left by kazad was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Sakana, radarjammer, Doc_Rostov)

name: godfatherofsouls
text: extremely fried

name: apocowarg
text: Pat is a fried dick.

name: soticoto
text: Well who's ready for some roasted-up ding dong !

name: snatch22
text: Would you really need the water on the floor?

name: apocowarg
text: Better safe than sorry.

name: mikeronomicon
text: The water on the floor acts as the conductor that the electricity runs through. Otherwise it would be very hard to fry Pat's dick.

name: sakana
text:
So if they successfully hooked up the battery to the toilet water, the current flows from there up the pee stream, into Pat, down onto the floor and into the puddle, which is in contact with the toilet pipe, which is metal, and connected to the ground.

Just guessing. Geez, I can't believe I spent the time to think about this.

name: agika
text: It needed to be done, Sakana.  My country and I owe you for doing it.

name: puguglypress
text: Who must do the hard things? He who can.

name: closefriend
text: Well, with a name like sakana (and the fact that you've yet to change it to yakizakana), I'd expect you of all... posters... to know about water (and electrocution).

name: n00b
text: isn't it impossible to keep a current going along a piss stream? i thought it was a bunch of droplets and not homogeneous. was it mythbusters who put that little thought into my head? can't remember...

name: adjakz
text: yep, it was Mythbusters, they showed in slow motion it was impossible to have your dick electrocuted that way.

name: mattylite
text: Ya, but that was human dick.

name: laserblade
text: Specifically, they showed that it is possible if you have a triple-wide urethra and hold your dick about three inches from the current source.

name: boredom_man
text: Uh-oh.

name: omegatron
text:
It's possible. Depends on whether it forms into droplets or remains as a continuous laminar flow.

http://www.cora.nwra.com/~werne/eos/images/laminar.jpg

http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=7461807350029539167

name: deusoma
text: I find it interesting that each of these blank posts has (right now, anyway) exactly 13 lames. If I cared more, I might check to see whether the same 13 people wasted a lame on each of them.

name: woodenteeth
text:
Don't ask questions. They are the 13 Lamieres. Hunting down blank posts, doing God's work.

... their work is kinda inconsistent.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: i refer to them as "The Lame Train"

name: dissembly
text:
Oh my god, now they are each exactly 16 lames. Subsequent lame-ers are keeping the dream alive!

I don't know how they do it. I can't figure out how assetbar tells you how many lames you have left. Surely someone would slip up...

text: I wish i could mark you as spam. Just sayin'

name: canusdivinus
text: Hate to say it, but urine doesn't go in a solid enough stream to form an electrical circuit. You can't see it, but it's more a collection of droplets.

name: mikeronomicon
text: If there is a strong enough source of electricity it will arc from drop to drop. It doesn't need to be a solid stream. I dare you to pee on an electric fence. It will prove this to be true.

name: idsyen
text: This is the only time I've rated a strip a 5 purely out of schadenfreude for a fictional character. Fuck you, Pat. You deserve what you get.

name: tekende
text: The KPMA Question of the Day that day was actually about citizens' opinions on a new road work project near a bank.

Crackling crank dance!

name: hendetta
text:
On the search page for this comic, the script is a little different.

[[Pat is on the phone with a radio show.]] /

Pat: Hello I was wondering as to the price of a big old vagina?

[[Pat is running through his house.]] /

Pat: [[Thinking]] Never do they answer my questions with anything relevent /

[[In bathroom]] / Pat: Oh yeah, can't wait to piss onto this toaster

Pat: [[Thinking]] yummmmmmm-yyyyy / <> / <> /

Pat: [[Thinking]] whoo boy

KPMA is an imaginary radio station.
